    The Destruction of Black Wealth with Ryan Cooper

    08 Dec 2017

    Journalist @ryanlcooper talks about the new paper he wrote with @MattBruenig, founder of the @PplPolicyProj, a new left-wing think tank founded by Bruenig and funded by the people. Foreclosed: Destruction of Black Wealth During the Obama Presidency details how the Wall Street-induced foreclosure epidemic wiped out huge swaths of black wealthâ€”and how Obama, the first black president, could have taken multiple actions to save most homes but did not.
